speech: Great, let's begin a new order! To get started, just tell me what you'd like, for example, 'I want two pizzas and one mango lassi.' Please remember to specify a quantity for each food item. Our menu includes Pav Bhaji, Chole Bhature, Pizza, Mango Lassi, Masala Dosa, Biryani, Vada Pav, Rava Dosa, and Samosa.

Awesome, we're all set to place a fresh order! Simply tell me what you're craving, like 'I'd like 3 biryanis and two samosas.' Don't forget to mention the quantity for each item you want. Our menu options are Pav Bhaji, Chole Bhature, Pizza, Mango Lassi, Masala Dosa, Biryani, Vada Pav, Rava Dosa, and Samosa.

Let's get your order going! Tell me what you'd like to eat and how many of each item, like 'I want one pizza and four samosas.' You can choose from our menu options: Pav Bhaji, Chole Bhature, Pizza, Mango Lassi, Masala Dosa, Biryani, Vada Pav, Rava Dosa, and Samosa.
